bug.author: yceugenelai
bug.summary: evaluate function issue of the Image Classification - Quick Start tutorial
bug.description: the evaluate result seems incorrect. Top-1 test acc: nan I have tried on my pc. it shows similar messages as the tutorial and return the wrong evaluate result too "UserWarning: Ignoring data/test/BabyPants of type . Only support .jpg, .jpeg, .png" is it a bug of getting class names or listing the images? or is there changes about dataset and/or evaluate function? Thank you

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting. It is a bug recently introduced. We will fix it.
